Transcription for 1724926

Would you say that your life has turned out the way you expected it to so far?
I find it really difficult with life here because everything and everyone has got their
ways of living. It's not, as I said earlier, it's not like you can just pick up the phone
and say do you want to come over. I'm finding life really difficult because I don't, again,
I don't have friends. I don't have my true friends. I'm happy in the way that I'm living
independently and I'm working but that's it. Apart from that there's nothing,
nothing else that makes me feel really comfortable.
And yeah, I just wish I could pick the phone up and say do you want to come over
and we can just do things.
